channel.title: Download data from a shared link
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
My company now use a self hosted redash. I have 3 questions. 1)I can't download data from a shared redash dashboard link,but i can download from a link like this "https://redash.yimian.com.cn/dashboard/-_4". could i download data from a shared link ? if yes,what can l do to realise it ? 2) dose Redash can only shared by open link? is there some way to share with a password ? 3) last week,our redash upgrade to a latest version. but now the "date" type filter can't remove the duplicates. such as ![image|690x353](upload://zd3O3TPkbh3MWl8f6mHlox5OJ3k.png)
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: 5.0.1+b4850 Version * Browser/OS:chrome * How did you install Redash: docker compose

item.title: Download data from a shared link
item.dc:creator: richard_skao
item.description:
I would also like ot be able to allow export to CSV on a shared link. Has there been any update on this in the last few years anyone?

Read full topic
item.source: Download data from a shared link

item.title: Download data from a shared link
item.dc:creator: puxialin
item.description:
Issue Summary

My company now use a self hosted redash. I have 3 questions.
1)I can’t download data from a shared redash dashboard link,but i can download from a link like this “Login to Redash”. could i download data from a shared link ? if yes,what can l do to realise it ?
2) dose Redash can only shared by open link? is there some way to share with a password ?
3) last week,our redash upgrade to a latest version. but now the “date” type filter can’t remove the duplicates. such as

Technical details:

  • Redash Version: 5.0.1+b4850 Version
  • Browser/OS:chrome
  • How did you install Redash: docker compose
